songs.title: Can You Buy That
songs.lyrics:
Chorus:
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
I could buy that!
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Here is this niggaare go again talking about how much money he got

Luda! Oh no, don't try that
Twenty million dollar crib I can buy that
You can see me in a...
Maseraties, lamborghinies, mother fucker, my bad!
Lay back making pay stacks
Can't do it on the... Don't chase that!
... I'm like take that, take that!
Champagne by the...
Keep a bottle of... When it's so cold
I'm rough I tell whores
Got in a magnum like...
Get it? I'm loco! I know people mob like...
All night with the door closed...
Higher, my... Is on, rotate like tires
I fuck the bitch before I fuck you
Damn right I'm tired!
I'm filthy rich, bitch, go spend some...
I went to the... And the ferrari dude was like...

Chorus:
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
I could buy that!
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
I could buy that!
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Your money is my money
I can buy that!

I can buy that shit
No niggaare can even deny that shit
Well, I bet the... Whatever you're driving
You better hide that shit!
Oh, fuck your life, kill yourself, niggaare
Go buy a casket, and kill yourself niggaare!
You can find me freaking...
Yeah, when you say go. I'm so outrageous
Money is tied up, bitch my money is the...
Your money is funny, my money is mean
Your money is coming, my money is...
Your money is... Stupid
My money is "get over here, finish him!"

Chorus:
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Yes, I can buy that!
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Ok, I can buy that!
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Mother, fucker can you buy that?
Niggaare, can you buy that?
